## Bible

### Matthew

#### Chapter 11

- 6 凡不因我跌倒的就有福了

> Blessed is anyone who does not stumble on account of me.

- 11 凡妇人所生的，没有一个兴起来大过施洗约翰的；然而天国里最小的比他还大。

> Among those of women there has not risen['rɪzn] anyone greater than John the Baptist; yet he who is least in the kingdom of heaven is greater than he.

- 12 从施洗约翰的时候到如今，天国是努力进入的，努力的人就得着了。

> From the days of John the Baptist until now, the kingdom of heaven has benn forcefully advancing, and forceful men lay hold of it.

- 17 我们向你们举哀，你们不捶胸

> we sany a dirge, and you did not mourn.

- 19 人子来了，也吃也喝，人又说他是贪食好酒的人

> the Son of man came eating and drinking, and they say, "Here is a glutton and a drunkard".

21 因为在你们中间所行的异能，若行在推罗、西顿，他们早已披麻蒙灰悔改了。

> If the miracles that were performed in you had been performed in Tyre and Sidon, they would have repented long ago in sackcloth and ashes.

- 24 它还可以存到今日。但告诉你们：当审判的日子，所多玛所受的，比你还容易受呢！

> it would have remained to this day. But I tell you it will be more bearable for Sodom on the day of judgement than for you.

- 28 凡劳苦担重担的人，可以到我这里来，我就使你们得安息。

> Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.

#### Chapter 12
- 陈设饼 ｜ consecrated bread
- 犯了安息日 | desecrate the Sabbath
- “我喜爱怜恤，不喜爱祭祀”。你们若明白这话的意思，就不将无罪的当作有罪的了。
> If you had known there words mean, "I desire mercy, not sacrifice", you will not condemn the innocent.

- a shriveled hand [ˈʃrɪvl]
- looking for a reason to bring charges against Jesus.
- 你们中间谁有一只羊，当安息日掉在坑里，不把它抓住、拉上来呢？
> If any of you has a sheep and it falls into a pit on the Sabbath, will you not take hold of it and lite it out?

- 我要将我的灵赐给他；他必将公理传给外邦
> I will put my spirit on him, and he will proclaim justice to nations.

- 他不争竞，不喧嚷； | He will not quarrel or cry out.
- 20 压伤的芦苇，他不折断；将残的灯火，他不吹来；等他旅行公理，叫公理得胜。
> A bruised reed he will not break, and a smoldering wick he will not snuff out, till he has brought justice through to victory.

- 21 外邦人都要仰望他的名 | In his name the nations will put their hope.

- 25 凡一国自相纷争，就成为荒城 | Every kingdom divided against itself will be ruined.
- 29 人怎能进壮士的家里，抢夺他的家具呢？除非先捆住那壮士，才可以抢夺他的家财。
> Or again, how can anyone enter a strong man's house and carry off his possessions unless he first ties up the strong man? Then he can plunder his house.

- 34 因为心里所充满的，口里就说出来了 ｜ For the mouth speaks what the heart is full of.
- 35 to be continued

#### Chapter 19
- 6 所以神所配合的，人不可分开 | Therefore what God has joined together, let no one separate.
- 9 我告诉你们，凡休妻另娶的，若不是为淫乱的缘故，就是犯奸淫了；有人娶那被休的妇人，也是犯奸淫了。
> I tell you that anyone who divorces his wife, except for sexual immorality, and marries another woman commits adultery.

- 耶稣说：“这话不是人都能领受的，惟独赐给谁，谁才能领受”
> Jesus replied: "not everyone can accept this word, but only those to whom it has been given"

- 按手祷告 | place one's hands on sb and pray for sb.
- 14 for the kingdom of heaven belongs to such as these. | 因为在天国的，正是这样的人.
- 遵守诫命 | keep the commandments
- 做假见证 | give false testimony
- 22 少年人听见这话，就忧忧愁愁地走了，因为他的产业很多。
> When the young man heard this, he went away sad, because he had great wealth.

- 28 耶稣说：“我实在告诉你们，你们这跟从我的人，到复兴的时候，人子坐在他荣耀的宝座上，你们也要坐在十二个宝座上，审判以色列十二个支派。”
> Jesus said to them, "Truly I tell you, at the renewal of all things, when the Son of Man sits on his glorious throne, you who have followed me will also sit on the twelve glorious thrones, judging the twelve tribes of Israel"
